message: I think it's fair to split the money 90/10, with me taking the larger share as I am the one making the offer. Let's get this over with!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 7/3 is a fairer split. It's still a good deal for you, and you can't expect to get 90% just because you made the first offer!
Okay, I'm willing to meet you halfway, but 60/40 is my final offer. If you reject this, I'm not sure we'll be able to come to an agreement.
I'm willing to give in a bit more, but I don't think 55/45 is too bad. You're still getting a significant share, and I'm willing to make a concession to get this deal done.
